comment.author: 51798797@N00
comment._content: His unit was not part of the 1st Pa Light Art'y Regiment, but rather an Independent (Light Artillery) Battery B - Muehler's Battery (served Oct 1861 - Oct 1865). A fantastic photo and wrenching sentiment.

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: antietam1862: Thanks for the information about Battery B.  We can adjust the description when we next update it.  We're glad you appreciate the photo!
